sources.title: Magoo's Check Up (1955)
sources.description: After a rather unpleasant incident followed by a suggestion that Magoo have his glasses checked, Magoo decides to have his eyes examined. He mistakes a television repair shop for an ophthalmologist/optometrist and the fun begins. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/magoos-check-up-1955/

metadata.Plot: When his neighbor suggests he get his glasses checked, Mr. Magoo goes in for a full-body check-up -- at a TV repair shop.
metadata.Actors: Jim Backus, Mary Jane Croft, Jerry Hausner
